name: Self Decay
description:
Controls

MOVE Press Left or Right Key

JUMP or DOUBLE JUMP Press Up Arrow Key/Twice Up Arrow Key

CROUCH Press Down Arrow Key 

SPRINT Press Left Shift Key

BASIC ATTACK Press Z 

AIR ATTACK Press Up Arrow + Z

Asset Used

https://ansimuz.itch.io/hazy-urban-landscape
https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-miami-synth
